Japan: Unprecedented scale epidemic ravages Heian-kyō, killing many nobles on the background of sectarian strife.
Spain:
Fernández was captured by a Cordoban raiding party.
Fernández died of his wounds at Medinaceli.  He was succeeded by his son Sancho García of the Good Laws of Castile.
Sweden: Olof Skötkonung, first Swedish king of whom there is substantial historical knowledge, succeeds to throne
